metadata.author: Wesley Quintero
metadata.purpose: AI chat context data for portfolio assistant

professionalProfile.title: Data-Driven Amazon & E-commerce Specialist
professionalProfile.tagline: Helping Brands Scale with Insights, Automation & AI
professionalProfile.description: Building AI-Powered Tools via Nebula-Singularity Platform

portfolio.summary: I can help you explore Wesley's portfolio
portfolio.details: Showcases expertise in Amazon e-commerce, data analytics, and AI-powered solutions.

experience.summary: Wesley is a certified Amazon Developer
experience.details: Extensive experience in e-commerce automation and data analytics.

contact.summary: You can reach Wesley via email or phone

services.summary: Wesley specializes in building AI-powered tools
services.details: Focus areas include e-commerce, data analytics, and process automation.

projectOverview.name: Amazon Seller Tools Suite
projectOverview.description: A suite of React-based tools designed to help Amazon sellers optimize listings, analyze performance, and manage their businesses effectively.
developmentPriorities: Enhancing Listing Quality Checker AI features

fbaCalculator.name: FBA Calculator
fbaCalculator.description: An advanced profitability calculator for FBA products.

keywordAnalyzer.name: Keyword Analyzer
keywordAnalyzer.description: A tool for analyzing and managing keywords.

listingQualityChecker.name: Listing Quality Checker
listingQualityChecker.description: An AI-powered tool for analyzing and optimizing Amazon listings.
knownIssues: AI features under review and refinement.
roadmap: Refine AI features and prompts based on testing results.

ppcCampaignAuditor.name: PPC Campaign Auditor
ppcCampaignAuditor.description: A comprehensive tool for analyzing PPC campaign performance and providing optimization recommendations.
knownIssues: Discrepancy between documented and internal status (Beta v0.9.0 vs. Active v2.0.0).
roadmap: Thorough testing with diverse campaign data.

descriptionEditor.name: Description Editor
descriptionEditor.description: An AI-enhanced rich text editor for Amazon product descriptions.
roadmap: Refine prompts/models based on testing results.

keywordDeduplicator.name: Keyword Deduplicator
keywordDeduplicator.description: Smart keyword management with AI-powered suggestions.
roadmap: Test accuracy of AI duplicate detection.
Refine prompts/models based on testing results.

acosCalculator.name: ACoS Calculator
acosCalculator.description: Comprehensive advertising analysis with predictive metrics and historical trend analysis.
knownIssues: Minor variations in CSV format can cause issues.
Low-spend campaigns might have inaccurate predictions.

competitorAnalyzer.name: Competitor Analyzer
competitorAnalyzer.description: Analyzes competitor data to identify opportunities and improve product positioning.

keywordTrendAnalyzer.name: Keyword Trend Analyzer
keywordTrendAnalyzer.description: Analyzes keyword trends to identify popular and emerging keywords.

profitMarginCalculator.name: Profit Margin Calculator
profitMarginCalculator.description: Calculates profit margins to determine profitability and optimize pricing strategies.

productScoreCalculator.name: Product Score Calculator
productScoreCalculator.description: Calculates a quality score for your Amazon product listing based on various optimization factors.
knownIssues: Number of images is limited by the input field, but not explicitly validated.
Rating is limited by the input field, but not explicitly validated.
Description allows HTML formatting, but there's no sanitization, which could be a security risk.

optimalPriceCalculation.name: Optimal Price Calculation
optimalPriceCalculation.description: Calculates the optimal price for a product based on cost, current price, competitor prices, and other factors.
knownIssues: Competitor prices are parsed as a comma-separated string, which could be prone to errors.
Input fields are not validated for all possible error conditions.

listingQualityChecker.name: ListingQualityChecker
listingQualityChecker.description: Main component for the Listing Quality Checker tool. Handles CSV uploads, ASIN input, data fetching, and rendering results.
functionalities: Error handling (missing columns, parsing errors, fetch errors)
listingQualityChecker.testing: Has unit tests (`listing-quality-checker.test.tsx`) using `@testing-library/react` and jest.

errorBoundary.name: ErrorBoundary
errorBoundary.description: React error boundary component that gracefully handles errors within its children.
functionalities: Rendering a fallback UI when an error occurs.
Resetting the error state via a 'Reload Page' button.
Logging error information to the console.
errorBoundary.testing: Has unit tests (`error-boundary.test.tsx`) to verify error handling.

sidebar.name: Sidebar
sidebar.description: A flexible and customizable sidebar component.
sidebar.technicalDetails: Uses `class-variance-authority` for styling, `lucide-react` for icons, and `shadcn/ui` components.

majorLibraries.name: papaparse
majorLibraries.purpose: CSV parsing (used in ListingQualityChecker and other components).

majorLibraries.name: class-variance-authority
majorLibraries.purpose: Styling React components with Tailwind CSS.

testing.approach: Unit and integration tests using `@testing-library/react` and jest.

errorHandling.example: The `ListingQualityChecker` handles CSV parsing errors and fetch errors with toasts.

projectStructure.description: The project is organized with core files located in the `src` folder.

directories.components: React components, logically separated by features (e.g., `amazon-seller-tools`, `ui`).
directories.app: Root application files, including pages and layouts.

ui.styling: Tailwind CSS, with `class-variance-authority` to manage component variations.
